19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean the car interior using a mop and cloth, then store and rearrange cleaning tools.

sub_events.name: Retrieve mop and clean car
sub_events.description: Pick up the mop and use it to sweep the car floor.

sub_events.name: Finish cleaning and place items in car
sub_events.description: Close the car, set the mop down, open the door, and place a cloth inside the car.

sub_events.name: Access storage to get cloth
sub_events.description: Move to the cabinet, open it, pick up a cloth, and move toward the wall while holding the cloth.

sub_events.name: Re-grab mop from wall
sub_events.description: Pick the mop stick from the wall to prepare or continue use.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Relocate and set up a laptop at a workspace by powering it down, moving it, reconnecting power, and arranging/using the keyboard and mouse.

sub_events.name: Wrap up and power down
sub_events.description: Finish interacting with the laptop (typing) and press the laptop button, then close it to power/shut down.

sub_events.name: Move laptop to workspace
sub_events.description: Disconnect and temporarily stow the laptop, then pick it up, place it on a table and open it at the new location.

sub_events.name: Reconnect power
sub_events.description: Retrieve the charger and plug it into the laptop and the wall socket.

sub_events.name: Set up keyboard
sub_events.description: Bring the keyboard to the table, place it, and use it (press keys).

sub_events.name: Set up and use mouse
sub_events.description: Pick up and place the mouse, hold and move it, and press its button to interact.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare onions and start cooking them (wash, cut, add to a pot with water, and turn on the cooker).

sub_events.name: Wash onion
sub_events.description: Turn on the tap to wash the onion under running water, then turn the tap off.

sub_events.name: Prepare and fill pot
sub_events.description: Pick up the pot, transfer the onion into it, place the pot under the tap, turn the tap on to fill the pot with water, then turn the tap off.

sub_events.name: Cut onion on board
sub_events.description: Place the onion on the cutting board, hold and slice it with a knife, put the knife down and release the onion.

sub_events.name: Start cooking and final onion prep
sub_events.description: Place the filled pot on the cooker and turn the cooker on to begin cooking; pick up the knife again to hold and peel/finish prepping the onion.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a wheel assembly: organize and store tools, tighten fasteners, remove the wheel, and complete final fastening.

sub_events.name: Tool staging
sub_events.description: Pick up individual tools (wrench, plier, spanner) and place them on the workspace to prepare for work.

sub_events.name: Tool packing and box closure
sub_events.description: Hold and put tools into a box, set them down, and cover the box with its lid (store/organize tools).

sub_events.name: Bolt tightening with wrench and spanner
sub_events.description: Use a wrench and then a spanner to position and tighten a nut/bolt, then set tools down.

sub_events.name: Wheel handling and final fastening
sub_events.description: Bring, adjust, and remove (take off) the wheel, followed by applying the wrench to perform final tightening.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten a wood piece to a wooden base by aligning and clamping the parts, drilling holes, and securing them with screws.

sub_events.name: Initial screw fastening
sub_events.description: Pick up a screwdriver and screw to insert a screw into the wood, then set tool down and release the screw.

sub_events.name: Temporary clamping on base
sub_events.description: Pick up a clamp, position and tighten it on the wood, then later loosen and remove the clamp.

sub_events.name: Position and secure parts for drilling
sub_events.description: Place the wood on the workbench, pick up and align the wood-piece, then pick and position a clamp to hold the assembly and tighten it.

sub_events.name: Drill pilot holes through the assembly
sub_events.description: Pick up the drill, hold the workpieces and drill holes (with tool withdrawals and tool set-downs) for the aligned parts.

sub_events.name: Release and prepare final screws
sub_events.description: Release the held wood-piece, then pick up screwdriver and screws and position screws on the wood-piece for final fastening.
